articles.summary: DGX Spark is a Mac Mini-sized AI supercomputer designed to bring advanced model development and inferencing directly to desktops. It was originally called Project Digits and expected to be priced at $3000, but the name has been changed and it's now $3999. It's designed to handle demanding AI workflows such as fine-tuning, inference, and prototyping without relying on external infrastructure. Dell, HPE, and Asus will offer similar alternatives with similar performance.

It weighs 1.2kg and is powered by the Grace Blackwell GB10 Superchip with 20 Arm cores, a Blackwell GPU, 128GB of LPDDR5X memory, and 200GbE NVIDIA ConnectX-7 network. It has 273GB/s memory bandwidth, four USB4 ports, HDMI, a 10GbE port, and a dual-port 200gbE NIC. It is available for reservation for $3,999.

articles.title: Do You Know Why Some Lipsticks Last Longer Than Others?
articles.author: Supriya Ramesh
articles.summary: There are many factors that affect the longevity of a lipstick. Lipstick is a careful blend of waxes, oils, pigments, and sometimes, ingredients that determine how long it will stick around on your lips. Matte lipsticks tend to last longer because they contain less oil. Long-wearing lipsticks often contain silicones and film formers. Creamy and glossy lipsticks have more oils and butters (emollients).

articles.title: Dr McKorley urges innovation to position Ghana as global industry leader
articles.summary: Dr. Daniel McKorley, Chief Executive Officer of McDan Group of Companies, has urged Ghanaian businesses to embrace innovation and creativity to establish themselves as global leaders in sales and entrepreneurship. He was speaking at the launch of the National Sales Leaders Conference (NSLC) 2025 in Accra. The conference is themed: 'Redefining Sales Excellence for Today's Dynamic Market' and is scheduled for August 20-22 at the Accra International Conference Centre. It is expected to attract 2,500 attendees from diverse industries.

Beijing is promoting homegrown AI startup Manus.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge, Galaxy Tab S10 FE Surface on Geekbench
articles.author: NDTV
articles.summary: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge has appeared on a performance benchmarking site ahead of its anticipated launch in select markets. It is set to join the Galaxy S 25 lineup introduced earlier this year and is expected to go on sale in the first few months of 2015.

articles.title: 'I still miss him' - Son Heung-min namedrops Harry Kane as he reminisces about 'fun' times with Bayern Munich striker & reveals he'd have loved to play alongside Ronaldo
articles.author: Goal
articles.summary: As part of the adidas You Got This campaign, the player is wearing a special kit. The kit is by adidas and is available on adidas.com/yougivedthis.      Â  . .

articles.title: Qatar Chamber launches its new strategy
articles.author: Qatar Tribune
articles.summary: QNADoha Chamber launched its new 2025-2030 business plan on Saturday. It is based on the report by the Qatar Chamber of Commerce and Industry, which is published by Qatar Chamber. It covers the period from 2025 to 30 years old.

articles.title: My T-Mobile 5G Home Internet Experience: The Good, the Bad and the Surprises
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: 5G home broadband service is superior to DSL but has some interesting quirks. I've lived with this service for over two years and it's been good to me. It's better than DSL but not as good as it used to be. It has its own quirks.
